comments.comment:
I have never seen pewds laughing this way and even crying of laughter, and it's over a kid's meme, this is hilarious
You ARE going to become a great father I can tell

Pewds silently realizing he'll have to hide from his own children is so perfect.

We're all very excited for your first RGB Gaming Baby Pewds!!!
Seeing pewds break down laughing at a child's slumber party plan to summon a demon was strangely wholesome to me.
i got a letter from a kid while serving in iraq..."dear servicemember. i hope you dont die" it was freakin adorable
PewDiePie getting emotional over some kid wanting to summon a demon is definitely the funniest and most wholesome thing I've ever seen
Watching this man cry was so heart warming in a weird way, it’s like becoming a father really settled in at that moment.
15:45 seeing pewds tear up while laughing made me emotional so proud to see how far he's come
This video getting recommended right after I’m done watching video of Björn being born, is algorithm working out at it’s finest.

Everyone: "Felix will surely mature after having a baby"

Felix: "Kids are very dumb."
Pewds getting emotional about a kid summoning a demon had me dead

I think the part where felix teared up is definitely some cropped up emotion (maybe bc its a massive step for them/realization).
Im happy for both of you felix! You’re gonna be amazing parents
Can’t wait for Felix and Ken to just be complete dads on YouTube together
Haven't seen him laugh this hard in a real long time. It is just so wholesome seeing him laugh and cry at a kid's sleepover list, he's gonna be a real good dad

I dont think we've ever seen pewds laugh this wholeheartedly
Makes us all happy
The universal child instinct to finish spilling no matter how much is left in the cup is hilarious  makes my stomach drop every time like it’s my floor
15:43 Felix starting to cry just from imagining his child doing that was sooo wholesome but like, had the worst and most hilarious timing ever
15:47 that was such a wholesome moment for me to see pewds so happy, laughing and yet emotional, i still can't believe the dude I've been watching for 7+ years is going to be a father.
The moment, when Felix was laughing/crying over a kid’s note was so wholesome and funny i can’t —
The training arc for the fatherhood of Felix starts now.

I love how pewds cries at the kid who wanted to “sumon a demon,” but it was obviously because of something to do with the fact that he is going to have a child rather than how funny the post was. An oddly touching moment
It's incredibly brave for Pewds to say this ahead of him becoming a father. Truly one of the most touching videos of all time.
Ngl seeing the parent be like it’s ok you panicked with that kid was so nice. I’m glad some parents don’t just flip out on there kids for stuff like that as much anymore
Pewdie crying over kids memes already shows he's becoming a great dad
I literally can't wait to watch Felix and Ken have relatable dad talks about baby things. I know ken's got to be looking forward to that!

You just know Pewds and Marzia are gonna be great parents. Look how happy their dogs are. 
Happy birthday Edgar!
im gonna be honest, i watched the part where he happy cried over and over. it just made my heart so warm. You'll be the coolest dad Felix.
Seeing Felix cry cuz he's slowly realizing he'll have the joy to see his kid do dumb stuff like this made me shed a tear 🥹
I love how Pewds is already becoming a dad. He spent so long just laughing at "summoning a demon". Which is just such a dad thing to do lmao.

He wasn't laughing at the slumber party list, I think hes just excited and joyful and those were his tears of joy. He knows his kid is going to do stuff like that and he can't wait. Congratulations Felix
seeing the guy who used to scream at amnesia custom stories now a soon to be dad crying over a kids meme made me nearly cry but not even in a sad way. I'm happy for him man.

He just went through that pre dad laughing crying moment. Its that moment where we realize our future child will be as wild as these kids... and it makes us happy and sad, yet its hilarious too... the sheer innocence and bluntness of children's nature is what we wish we could go back to. But we are adults now and life is shitty... we got responsibilities and barely have enough time for our families or kids
11 years watching pewds and this the first time I’ve seen him genuinely succumb laughter… warms my heart
The kids breaking in when dad needed a 2 minute break is too real. That is absolutely what having kids is like. Pewds is in for it.
18:05 I love how kids just decide that since they started pouring ,they might as well finish
I love how every child is somewhat accidentally suicidal from running towards a bear to consciously trying to summon a demon.

Pewds: "Are kids just a nightmare?... Is this what it is to have kids?"
Marzia in love with anything nightmarish and morbid: "Exactly"
Never would have thought pewds will cry over a kids meme. Very wholesome lol
The kid who panicked when his sock got wet and dropped the mug... that's just my whole life

I was a kid myself when I discovered you, I've grown watching you from having no idea to having a career. It's amazing to see you go from young yourself to accomplishing something amazing and now experiencing bringing you're own kid into the world. I wish you guys all the best in the whole world.

Ah pewdiepie becoming a dad, he's came along way, and us old fans with him since day 1. We witnessed Pewds grow and mature over the years. All the best for you pewdiepie, and may your son/daughter have a bright future ahead

I'm so happy for you and Marzia, I know with her gentleness and creativity and your humor and kindness, you'll be wonderful parents. It's crazy to see you become a dad now that I'm 21, I've been watching you since I was 12! Wishing Marzia the best of luck with her pregnancy and delivery <3

I feel like we’re all growing at the same time together and seeing you cry over having a baby really just makes me realise how much all of us here have grown up️ you will be such an amazing father and Marzia an amazing mother! You’ll both laugh and cry and struggle - but enjoy parenthood!️

Pewds: about to get a child
Also pewds: instantly makes fun of children

I wonder if a father like pewds who knows what cringe is can stop other's cringe...
With Pewds being more emotional seeing kids do shenanigans than before, truly gives us the idea that Pewds really ready to just see it everyday

15:55
The moment when Felix REALLY realized he was going to be a father.
Wholesome AF
It happened to me, and I am just an Aunt
I love how the little girl is crying her eyes out,and she literally carried the whole play, and the others were just not dancing  she is a true hero up there lol
That laughing fit is just proof that Felix is gonna be one of those giggly dads. I’m so excited for him.

the mother in the cold water clip is very good at teaching children.  She explained clearly to her kid and still let him make the mistake (which she can handle later without hurting the kid) So the kid can learn a valuable lesson.
Very new dad myself, daughters 7 months old. It's such an experience. The first time your child smiles at you, reaches for you, talks to you is so joyous. I can't wait to see her grow up more.
I’ve never seen him laugh that hard, absolutely amazing

It was so sweet to see pewds cry laughing. That was such a genuine human reaction and I think that he could’ve been realizing that he could have a kid that would do the same shit. Maybe im reading in and he was just cry laughing but there seemed to be a bit more behind it
Felix makes lots of jokes like feeding his kids dog food  but in reality he is going to be an amazing dad!

I've never seen Felix like that (with a few exceptions). It was so surreal, him going to be a dad finally set in at least that's what it seemed like. it was so heartwarming. it makes me realize how much has changed. from me being a child watching Felix talk to Stephano, Jenifer, in amnesia throw in Mcpixel sprinkle fear on it and put happy wheels on top. to now being 20 almost 21 growing with his content watching everything change around me and realizing that he shaped so many lives from behind a screen. Now he has a chance to shape someone's life without a camera. I can't wait for him to be a dad he will be amazing.
17:56 It can't spill from the cup if it's not in the cup!
16:00 it's the pregnancy hormones getting to you Felix
16:05 the pregnancy got felix emotional

I'm trying not to laugh to loud while my little ones are sleeping. Congrats on parenthood!!! 
It's extremely hard but extremely rewarding. Get yourself a good group of supportive friends for you and for Marzia. Having friends who are also parents is a special kind of comradery, so if you can get that kind of support, hold on to it! I pray that Marzia has a healthy pregnancy, smooth delivery, and a speedy postpartum recovery!
Immediately watching this after seeing Pewds baby video just makes me excited for the future

Dude this kid is going to grow up with Swedish, Italian, English, and possibly Japanese, with cool ass parents, IN JAPAN. Like, I’m so jealous. This kid is going to have an awesome life!! I love you Pewds!! I've been watching since I was 12, and I’m turning 25 this year!! So so happy for you and Marzia ️
Man Pewds really got me laughing and crying too, their kid is gonna have some great parents :')

Ahh I could just imagine 3-5 years later. Pewdiepie making another one of his goofy videos, and suddenly his kid comes into the room crying or asking for something and we get a cute moment in the video
7:14 This is the calmest panicked mom I've ever seen
Seeing Pewds cry made me imagine this could’ve been his reaction to Marzia being pregnant and it’s the most wholesome and emotional thing like I’m actually crying
So wholesome seeing pewds genuinely crying of real laughter, made my day.
I mean to be fair the fact that anyone would write that as a goal is very funny imo xD
Pewds never fails to make me laugh my god, love ya man, im sure you`re gonna be a great dad
lmao your kid is gonna have the best parents. marzia, the gentle and kind one, and felix, the one that playfully shoves the kid down/trips them while the kid is running
I feel like pewds will be exactly the kind of dad as Phil the dad in Modern Family and it’s just gonna be so wholesome
Felix is gonna ball his eyes out when he sees his kid for the first time.
He meant to do it, it was all a part of the plan.
felix laughing in tears for such a small joke is such a dad's move.
15:45 Idk why that was emotional for me seeing him cry/laugh like that. I am just so proud of pewds, he is gonna be an GREAT dad.
16:10 The pregnancy hormones have started to kick in to Pewds too =)

"kids are dumb"
five months later
it's stupid that I'm tearing up watching this. Pewds, thank you for being there for us and sharing your journey!

15:44 is the best part of the video ️️ could see Papa Pewds in those moments. He's going to make such a great father and Marzia, a great mum. And Edgar, a great older brother / uncle figure, along with adorable Momo. This is so precious.
7:00 At the restaurant I worked for we literally heated them to 80 degrees celsius in the oven. That way the food could be arranged and delivered while keeping heat in the dish.

When Pewds started half laughing/crying at the slumber party to do list is something that all fathers could relate to at some point, the thought of how a small child could come up with the idea is just amazing and wholesome.

Gotta love the duality of a girl’s world. Bake cookies, watch movies, summon a demon, pillow fight. That about sums it up. 

Good luck Pewds, that’s all I can say.

18:00
Might as well finish the job
He's a dad now and most likely his true softie side will come out  Just like his caring heart with Marzia!

The mom who had the kid going into the water did exactly what any good parent would. Being structural and logical, telling them to think before they act, and if they still take the risk and it goes sour, they can't cry about it and complain, because it was their own doing. It's a great lesson to learn for any kid!

This video made me laugh so much. My own son is now in the official 9 year old army. We were told a few weeks ago by his teacher that he was borderline "gifted". His language and literature skills are amazing.

He comes out of school today and reads us part of his book and pronounces Pony as Ponny (like Bonnie). Had to give him an epic roasting for that to keep him down to earth.

You are going to have the most epic fun raising a kid Pewds. The dumb times for parents and kids are literally the best thing you can experience. Just be aware you have 10 years until your kid surpasses you at gaming skills!
15:45 the moment of self reflection of what it might actually be like to have a kid, even made me tear up he's gonna be the best dad for his child

10:42 
"Ice cream". He make such a good point
Man, I’m so grateful that I subbed to this great man back in 2010. He deserves every good thing he has in life rn

I never had an interest in kids until my half brother was born when I was 17. It’s been 2 years and I love him more than anything and look at kids in a whole new light. I can already tell how much joy this baby will bring for Felix and Marzia, and I know they will be amazing parents.
Seeing pewds getting emotional while laughing makes me emotional too. Congrats Felix and Marzia.
bro raised a whole generation and now a child of his own mad respect

I started watching around age 13. I am now turning 23. Seeing the milestones of you getting engaged, married and now having a baby is wild to me. Never thought we’d get to this point but I’ve literally waited a decade for this. I’m so excited
Felix's laugh when he read "summon a demon" in the "to do list" was so contagious,i could barely contain myself and to make it worse i trained Abbs just yesterday

the peer pressure experiment is actually quite scary because you can see how natural and easy it is to pressure people into adopting view points they normally wouldn't have. And I would bet that many people never grew out of this mindset, as you can clearly tell by current events.

Pewds's dad hormones kicking in while cry-laughing is too funny and relatable
We were dumb too when we were kids, mistakes & failures teach us how to be wiser & smarter.
I’ve never seen Pewds cry laugh like that before, that was glorious  pure joy
It always feels so surreal now. After years of making video, he lives his dream life and just chillingly makes videos which makes me feel nostalgic everytime. I hope he keeps on making videos.

Pewds: *Laughing at children in pain*

Everyone: “Father Material!”
Now that Biörns here, i can tell the little guy is in for a fun ride!

Seeing Felix tear up, made me emotional as well! Really just reminds how far he has come and how long we've been following along. It just brings me so much joy to see him so happy! It's emotional time and it's good to let that out, even if it's through r/kidsarefstupid xD

18:10 I remember also the thought process I had as a kid when my sock got a bit wet on the tip when I was playing outside at the greek, so I didn't want my mom to find out, so I had the genius idea to soak the whole sock in water, cause then there wouldn't be a dark water spot noticable, cause the whole sock had that color. So like, she can't tell it is wet, because there is no dark water spot on it.
15:29 Felix crying just thinking of the day he'll get to summon a demon with his own child! What a lovely bonding exercise!
Felix crying made my day so much better more than you would ever believe. I'm at my lowest and it's been rough. So thank you Felix for this heartwarming video.
Pewds at the "summon a demon" part really felt like a dad ️
That kid with the cold water was the best and a GREAT example of a wonderful, caring mother. She did everything 100% right!

"Sumon a demon":
The little girl crying while carrying the whole dancer performance.... I know how she felt, I had group projects I carried in grade school too and it's so much pressure
i love that he cried when he laughed, i think he’s just so emotional at the moment becoming a father it all came out
I cannot wait to hear Felix get dad advice from Ken. It's all been leading this.

first felix be like im not a baby 16:22 cryng

2:04 tbf, kinda impressive how long she was able to not give in to group pressure. I hope she will stay/improve that way cause its a good thing to have as a person.
Your kid is gonna be hella smart. Able to grow up learning Italian, English, Japanese AND Swedish.

It's amazing to see how much time has passed and how much PewDiePie's channel has grown over the years. I wish PewDiePie and his family all the best on this exciting journey!
I didn’t know he was having a kid after 11 years of watching him I was told by ‘SO IM GOING TO BE A DAD’ right at the start of the video well congrats pewds
